metadata.title: CVE-2019-12779 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: libqb before 1.0.5 allows local users to overwrite arbitrary files via a symlink attack, because it uses predictable filenames (under /dev/shm and /tmp) without O_EXCL.

notes.note: mdeslaur> 1.0.4 is problematic, 1.0.5 was released to fix it. mitigated by symlink restrictions, low priority

criterions.comment: libqb package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.5-1').
